verses.text: Help, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* godly man ceases. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* faithful fail \w from|strong="H5921"\w* amongst \w the|strong="H5921"\w* children \w of|strong="H4210"\w* men.

Everyone lies \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w neighbour|strong="H1121"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* speak \w with|strong="H3068"\w* flattering lips, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* double heart.

\w May|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* cut \w off|strong="H7453"\w* all \w flattering|strong="H2513"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* tongue \w that|strong="H3820"\w* boasts,

\w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* prevail. \w Our|strong="H3068"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* own. \w Who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H3068"\w* us?”

“Because \w of|strong="H8193"\w* \w the|strong="H1396"\w* oppression \w of|strong="H8193"\w* \w the|strong="H1396"\w* weak \w and|strong="H8193"\w* because \w of|strong="H8193"\w* \w the|strong="H1396"\w* groaning \w of|strong="H8193"\w* \w the|strong="H1396"\w* needy, I \w will|strong="H4310"\w* now arise,” says \w the|strong="H1396"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; “I \w will|strong="H4310"\w* set him \w in|strong="H8193"\w* safety \w from|strong="H8193"\w* those \w who|strong="H4310"\w* malign him.”

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s words \w are|strong="H3068"\w* flawless words, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* silver refined \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* clay furnace, purified seven times.

You \w will|strong="H3068"\w* keep \w them|strong="H3068"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. You \w will|strong="H3068"\w* preserve \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* generation forever.

\w The|strong="H8104"\w* wicked walk \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H1755"\w* side, \w when|strong="H3068"\w* what \w is|strong="H3068"\w* vile \w is|strong="H3068"\w* exalted amongst \w the|strong="H8104"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3068"\w* men.
